actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Pollock-Herreid unit, South Dakota pumping division, Missouri River Basin project, South Dakota.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Pollock-Herreid unit, South Dakota pumping division, Missouri River Basin project, South Dakota. Authorizes appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct, operate, and maintain the Pollock-Herreid unit, South Dakota pumping division, Missouri River Basin project, South Dakota.
